body_html:
1. It makes it difficult to compare the performance of runs with different splits. If there is an easy way to configure it I would use it but if that is too much hassle to implement I can also live without it.
  2. You are so correct, I completely misinterpreted that ....
  3. The idea with tf.cond is great.

body:
1. It makes it difficult to compare the performance of runs with different splits. If there is an easy way to configure it I would use it but if that is too much hassle to implement I can also live without it.
2. You are so correct, I completely misinterpreted that ....
3. The idea with `tf.cond` is great.
